summary_text: This paper discusses the Potsdam Commentary Corpus, a corpus of german assembeled by potsdam university.
The corpus was annoted with different linguitic information.
the "Potsdam Commentary Corpus" or PCC consists of 170 commentaries from Ma¨rkische Allgemeine Zeitung, a German regional daily.
This corpus includes 173 texts on politics from the on-line newspaper Märkische Allgemeine Zeitung.
It is annotated with several data: morphology, syntax, rhetorical structure, connectors, correference and informative structure.
Nevertheless, only a part of this corpus (10 texts), which the authors name "core corpus", is annotated with all this information.
The texts were annotated with the RSTtool.
This corpus has several advantages: it is annotated at different levels.
All the texts were annotated by two people.
it is free for research purposes.
The disadvantages are: the genre and domain of all the texts are the same, the methodology of annotation was quite intuitive and the inter-annotator agreement is not given.
